pattern_finance_invoice_001.name: Invoice Processing
pattern_finance_invoice_001.description: End-to-end invoice processing workflow including receipt, validation, approval, and payment
examples: Invoice received, line items validated against PO, routed to appropriate approver based on amount, approved or rejected, then payment processed
Vendor invoice submitted, matched against purchase order, approval workflow based on invoice amount, payment executed
validation_rules: Approval authority depends on invoice amount

pattern_finance_budget_001.name: Budget Approval Cycle
pattern_finance_budget_001.description: Annual budget planning, review, approval, and monitoring process
examples: Budget cycle initiated, departments prepare proposals, finance reviews and consolidates, executive approval, allocates budget, tracks quarterly
Budget planning, departmental submissions, consolidation review, board approval, distribution to cost centers, monthly monitoring
validation_rules: Executive approval required for final budget

pattern_finance_expense_001.name: Expense Reimbursement
pattern_finance_expense_001.description: Employee expense submission, validation, approval, and reimbursement process
examples: Employee submits expense report with receipts, finance validates against policy, approves if compliant or requests clarification, processes reimbursement
Travel expense submission, documentation check, policy compliance review, manager approval, payment processing

pattern_finance_payment_001.name: Payment Processing
pattern_finance_payment_001.description: Payment order creation, validation, scheduling, and execution workflow
examples: Payment order created, amount validated against invoice, dual authorized by two signers, scheduled for due date, executed, then reconciled against bank statement
Create payment, verify amount and vendor, dual approval, schedule payment, process, reconcile with ledger
validation_rules: Dual authorization required for payments above threshold
Bank account must have sufficient funds

pattern_finance_reconciliation_001.name: Bank Reconciliation
pattern_finance_reconciliation_001.description: Monthly bank statement reconciliation matching transactions and identifying discrepancies
examples: Bank statement received, transactions matched to ledger, discrepancies identified and investigated, resolved by adjusting entries or bank corrections, reconciliation approved
Monthly statement arrives, matching process, reconciliation of differences, investigation of timing issues, finalization
validation_rules: All transactions must be accounted for

pattern_finance_audit_001.name: Financial Audit Preparation
pattern_finance_audit_001.description: Preparation for internal or external audit including documentation gathering and review
examples: Audit initiated, financial records gathered, reviewed for completeness, issues identified and documented, corrective actions taken, audit trail prepared
Audit scheduling, documentation collection, compliance check, findings documentation, remediation tracking, audit readiness confirmation

pattern_finance_accrual_001.name: Accrual and Cutoff
pattern_finance_accrual_001.description: Period-end accrual processing and transaction cutoff for accurate financial reporting
examples: Period-end cutoff identified, accruals for unpaid expenses, revenue calculated, journal entries recorded, accruals verified, reflected in financial statements
End of period, accrual items identified, amounts calculated, entries journalized, validation performed, reporting included

pattern_finance_cash_flow_001.name: Cash Flow Forecasting
pattern_finance_cash_flow_001.description: Rolling cash flow forecasting and analysis for liquidity management
examples: Cash data collected, 12-month forecast prepared, variance analysis performed, liquidity risks identified, mitigation strategies planned, reported to leadership, monitored weekly
Collection of cash projections, forecasting, scenario analysis, risk assessment, action planning, executive reporting, ongoing tracking
validation_rules: Weekly monitoring of actuals vs forecast
